law.text: Any employer who violates KRS 337.200 shall be fined not less than one hundred dollars ($100) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500). Each day that the employer violates KRS 337.200 shall constitute a separate offense and penalty. If the employer is a corporation, the officers of the corporation shall be personally liable for the penalty imposed herein.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990.
